msbt.message: Jolly Redd's Treasure Trawler. We sell masterpieces by the great masters, plus stuff for your master bedroom.Oh, it's you! Uhyou know we don't do refunds, right? O-of course you do. So how can I help you?

Your wha? Campsite? Sure, cousin, I can help you furnish youroh, you want me to STAY there?You know I'd really love to, but, uh Oh, a customer just walked in. Sorry, I gotta deal with this. Take care!
